events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30th involving a collision with another vehicle.
Based on details provided, the claim has been categorised under Auto Accident to ensure prompt processing and relevant handling.
An agent has been assigned to the case to assist the customer with all necessary formalities and provide continuous support.
We have acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed the details provided regarding the auto collision incident.
The customer has been requested to submit supporting documents including photos of the damage and police report for further assessment.
The customer submitted all required documents promptly including accident photos, police report, and vehicle damage estimates.
The investigation team has begun reviewing submitted evidence and evaluating the circumstances surrounding the auto accident.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of the customerâ€™s liability coverage and verification of damages caused by the collision.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the customer covering vehicle repair costs and related expenses from the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication throughout the process.
After review, the claim has been officially approved and all settlement terms confirmed by both the insurer and customer.
The settlement payment has been issued and transferred to the customer's account to cover repair expenses promptly.
The claim has been closed successfully following full settlement and confirmation from the customer that repairs were completed.
